basic.subject: Exercise - Team Activation - Exercise
basic.message:
Please respond to the following question by clicking on an answer below:

The team has been activated due to yesterday's incident. Please give your availability to report to the site. This is only an exercise.

  • Option 1 - I can be at the site in 2 hours
  • Option 2 - I can be at the site in 3 hours
  • Option 3 - I can report to the site tomorrow at 9:00 AM
  • Option 4 - I am unable to report to the site today or tomorrow.

poll.question: The team has been activated due to yesterday's incident. Please give your availability to report to the site. This is only an exercise.

options.value: I can be at the site in 2 hours
options.description: I can be at the site in 2 hours

options.value: I can be at the site in 3 hours
options.description: I can be at the site in 3 hours

options.value: I can report to the site tomorrow at 9:00 AM
options.description: I can report to the site tomorrow at 9:00 AM

options.value: I am unable to report to the site today or tomorrow.
options.description: I am unable to report to the site today or tomorrow.

search.name: search
search.description: A value matched against one or more resource properties.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: A comma seperated list of properties to order by. Properties preceded by a '-' will be ordered descending. (e.g.  ?sort=lastName,firstName,-responseTime). Property names are case insensitive.

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: The starting date for the date range.

maxLength.description: MaxLength for this variable. This will be used when validating a message length

isError.description: Indicates if there are any validation failures in this response

validationFailures.description: Validation failures of this request object

usedMessageVariables.description: Used variables by Message Variable Source

hasErrors.description: Set true when status.isSuccess is false.

isValid.description: Set false on API parameter validation failures.

Association.description: Defines associations between the domain models and other entities. Supported domain models include Disclaimers and Incidents. Supported key values include Asset.ExternalId, Area, Subarea.

publicContentPageRequested.description: Indicates that the alert sender wants a public alert page with an external link

originalUrl.description: The original URL to be shortened

requestConfirmation.description: When true, it instructs the backend to add a prompt for the recipient to confirm receipt of the email.

hiddenReceived.description: Filter alerts by received and whether to return hidden or visible.

unreadReceived.description: Filter alerts by received and whether to return read or unread.

associations.description: Associations describing which users sent the alert(s).

page.description: The page number of items to return. (1 by default)

pageSize.description: The desired number of items per page. (25 by default)

sort.description: A comma seperated list of properties to order by. Properties preceded by a '-' will be ordered descending. (e.g.  ?sort=lastName,firstName,-responseTime). Property names are case insensitive.

contactIds.description: the contact ids of the contacts to return, respecting AGs

forcedContactIds.description: the contact ids of the contacts to return, ignoring AGs

externalIds.description: the externalIds of the contacts to return, respecting AGs

groupId.description: the group id of the contacts to return

groupIds.description: A set of Group Ids that contacts belong to

adminIds.description: A set of Admin Ids to resolve into contacts

credentialIds.description: A set of Credential Ids to resolve into contacts

includeNestedGroups.description: When used in conjunction with groupId or groupIds asks the system to return all contacts in the groups specified and all of the nested groups underneath the groups specified.

chatEnabledOnly.description: search for contacts, returning only those who have a chat user id

includeAsset.description: include Asset information along with each contact (true by default)

search.description: A value matched against one or more resource properties.

lastNameSearch.description: A value match the first letter of the Contact Last Name

emailSearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact emails

emailPrefixMatching.description: If an email is passed in, indicates that the email must start with the provided value.

phoneNumberSearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact Cell Phone, Home Phone, or Business Phone

agencySearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact Agency

titleSearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact Title

NotesSearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact Notes

AddressSearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact Address

includeIsMobileUser.description: Include whether login is a Mobile user (false by default)

associations.description: Associations describing which users sent the alert(s).

page.description: The page number of items to return. (1 by default)

pageSize.description: The desired number of items per page. (25 by default)

sort.description: A comma seperated list of properties to order by. Properties preceded by a '-' will be ordered descending. (e.g.  ?sort=lastName,firstName,-responseTime). Property names are case insensitive.

includePhoneStatus.description: Include whether to return opt-out status for phones (false by default)

zipSearch.description: A value match against characters in the contact Zip Code

id.description: Type: Guid. Identifier for this incident.

HasErrors.description: Set true when status.isSuccess is false.

IsValid.description: Set false on API parameter validation failures.

isValid.description: Set false on API parameter validation failures.

criticality.description: The criticality level of this option
The criticality level of this option

count.description: Number of recipients that have responded with this option

criticality.description: The criticality level of this option

totalResponded.description: Number of recipients that have responded

PreviewAlertRequest.description: The templatedId parameter is deprecated. Clients should send alert settings via the settings parameter.

templateId.description: Deprecated. Clients should send alert settings via the settings parameter.

isSuccess.description: False when errorCode is not None or there is an errorMessage or validationFailures.

jobId.description: optional. A job identifier specified by the client to correlate this alert with a job. Maximum length is 100 characters.

correlationKey.description: optional. A key specified by the client to correlate this alert with other actions. Maximum length is 100 characters.

async.description: optional. Specifies whether an asynchrounous notification is sent to the sender on alert transition to final state

question.description: Clients need not set this value. If missing, it will be set on the server.

option.description: Clients need not set this value. If missing, it will be set on the server.

shortenedUrl.description: Shortened URL of the shortened URL

originalUrl.description: Original URL of the shortened URL

dateCreated.description: Date created of the shortened URL

dateUpdated.description: Date updated of the shortened URL

views.description: Number of views of the shortened URL

disabled.description: Enabled state of the shortened URL

alertType.description: Filter default template for a specific alert type.

incidentId.description: Filter default template for a specific incidentId.

priority.description: Filter default template for a specific priority.

relatedAlertId.description: The integer Id that you are relating the new alert to.

relatedType.description: The integer Id that you are relating the new alert to.

pollQuestionId.description: The integer Id of the poll question that you are relating the alert to.

pollOptionId.description: The integer Id of the poll option that you are relating the alert to.

templateId.description: The Id of the template to base defaults on

alertId.description: The Id of a prior alert to base defaults on (resend or reschedule)

JwtBearerTokenScheme.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer 12345abcdef"
JwtBearerTokenScheme.name: Authorization
